pr_title: Check brute force limit in nearest neighbor blueprint.

timeline.message: Check brute force limit in nearest neighbor blueprint.

timeline.bodyText: i don't see the need to have _use_brute_force as another flag; just update _approximate with "false" instead.
timeline.author: arnej27959

timeline.message:
Disable approximate search in nearest neighbor blueprint
when ratio of candidates in the global filter is too low.
